attributes.action: abolish the new system vehicle excice duty which penalises everyone who drives a family size car
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With high petrol taxes and congestion charges  the government is already bleeding the motorist dry. These new VED bands will not help climate change or the state of our roads which are terrible. THe money will merely go to fund the governments debts. Yet another tax on ordinary people!
